about_group_type_description:
Interactive group means every member can post a message. For chat groups, please select this group type. 

One-way group means only admin can post messages and others can only read.

describe_app_attraction:
When you download the app, you will be able to chat with anyone in your own language, regardless of the other person's language.
All messages will be received and sent in your own language.
You can have multi-lingual chats with anyone in the world without worrying about knowing other languages.
describe_security_code: A security code is a 3 or 4 digit number separate from your credit card number. It is physically printed on the top right hand side of the signature strip on the back of the card for most cards. American Express Cards have a four-digit number printed above the account number on the front of the card.
description_delete_admin_account:
Delete the admin account.
This operation cannot be undone.
Are you sure to delete it?
description_delete_user: The staff you delete will no longer have access to information about your tenant. Inquiries which are assigned to the staff will not be able to change the status or transfer, and will be automatically completed after the set time has elapsed.
description_group_icon: Used for chat list and invitation screen.
description_log_off_user_forcibly: Inquiries which are assigned to the staff will not be able to change the status or transfer, and will be automatically completed after the set time has elapsed.
description_what_account_id_is: Account ID is the number of ten digits number after https://kzn.chat/ in your setting page.
do_not_use_incognito_mode: You've got incognito. Please don't use browser in private mode. We are not supporting that mode.
editing_sandbox_warning: You have a draft that is being edited.
editing_sandbox_warning_description: There is a draft in the process of editing.\nThe content of the draft may be overwritten when the data in the draft is reflected in the production environment.\nDo you sign in to the production environment as it is?
error_and_reboot: An unexpected error occurred. Please restart app.
error_send_message: The message could not be sent.
execute_re_translate_description: It will take some time for all the retranslations to be completed. Would you like to retranslate all of this hotel-specific dictionary messages?

Please reload the screen.

Please access again with a browser in normal mode.
